entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
